projects.name: My Portfolio
projects.description: I created this webpage to showcase my work and skills. I wanted to try using Next.js and TypeScript for a real project, since I had only used these tools for tutorials. I really liked the result and the workflow with Next.js.
projects.tagline: My own webspace where I can showcase my work and skills

projects.name: BlogUi
projects.description: A blog made with React and styled with Daisyui. It features a rich text editor that supports code blocks with syntax highlighting and media embeds. Anyone can add new posts, as well as edit and delete existing ones.
projects.tagline: A blog where anyone can create and edit posts

projects.name: Movie Finder
projects.description: Film and TV hub where you can get relevant details, pictures and videos about any media. I got all the information from TMDB's API. For this project I decided to not use any css library and instead do all the styles myself.
projects.tagline: A film and tv hub with details, pictures and videos of popular media.

projects.name: Typing Speed Test
projects.description: A python app to test your typing speed. With customization options like test duration and difficulty. It can be run as a native app or in the browser. Inspired by monkeytype.
projects.tagline: A python app to test your typing speed.

projects.name: Book Notes
projects.description: Web app where I can keep track of the books I've read; reviews are stored in a Postgresql database (I migrated my db to supabase a little while ago). I used The Open Library API for book details and cover images.
projects.tagline: Website where I can rate and review the books I've read.

projects.name: Tic Tac Toe
projects.description: An interactive command line version of tic tac toe. You can play it by yourself (against the computer) or with a friend. It can handle invalid inputs and commands.
projects.tagline: An interactive command line version of tic tac toe

projects.name: Watermark App
projects.description: This app lets you apply a text watermark to your pictures. You can customize the size, opacity, font and position of the watermark.
projects.tagline: This app let's you apply a watermark to your pictures

projects.name: Morse Decoder
projects.description: A script that can convert Morse code to text and vice versa. It accepts symbols and numbers. Made for the terminal.
projects.tagline: A script that can convert Morse code to text
